title: Strategic Roadmap
bullets: Mandate the Platform Team to build “Golden Paths” for AI (Secure Sandboxes) and Data.
Establish the “Business Technologist” organization, career ladder, and governance standards.
Deploy Fusion Teams into BUs (merging IT & Business) and launch an FDE pilot for a major client.
Reinforce values: “Soft Lanes,” “Failure is OK,” and “The Players Matter” to empower the new verticals.
notes: Dark navy gradient background. Large white title top-left with a thin horizontal divider line beneath spanning most of slide. Main content is a 2x2 grid of rounded dark cards with subtle border and soft shadow. Each card has a small teal icon in its top-left corner and a single paragraph of light-gray text centered vertically within the card (left-aligned). No photos.

nodes.label: Card 1: Mandate the Platform Team to build “Golden Paths” for AI (Secure Sandboxes) and Data.
Card 2: Establish the “Business Technologist” organization, career ladder, and governance standards.
Card 3: Deploy Fusion Teams into BUs (merging IT & Business) and launch an FDE pilot for a major client.
Card 4: Reinforce values: “Soft Lanes,” “Failure is OK,” and “The Players Matter” to empower the new verticals.
